text.textblock: The Fish and Wildlife Service has determined that an Environmental
Assessment, as defined under the authority of the National Environmental
Policy Act of 1969, need not be prepared in connection with regulations
adopted pursuant to section 4(a) of the Endangered Species Act of 1973,
as amended. A notice outlining the Service's reasons for this
